reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater comfortable and well-fitting, with sleeves that are a perfect length. They appreciate its medium weight, noting it's heavy enough for cold days, and its true black color. The sweater receives positive feedback for its quality and looks, with one customer highlighting its beautiful lines, while another notes its rich color. Customers find it warm and suitable for winter, with one mentioning

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, colorful, warm and stylish
items.body: Love these turtleneck sweaters. Are form fitting, soft, warm and comfortable. Look great with slacks or skirts. I also ordered these sweaters in a black and a wine color. Thick enough to wear under a coat or jacket in winter. And warm enough to wear with out a jacket, in autumn or early spring. Read more
items.author: Lydia from Boston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this classic sweater!!
items.body: Timeless, classic sweater! I bought it in many colors the past few years. Very comfortable and it fits great!! The colors are really great too!! Read more
items.author: Linda Ribich

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fabric/shrunk a little bit though. Would order again.
items.body: Fantastic fabric. Feels rich. It shrank a little after the first wash whih is why I only gave four starts. I can still wear it, but if you have an extra long torso beware. I'm 5'7" with a longish torso and ordered a Large. It fits fine after washing but I preferred the longer fit before washing. Read more
items.author: BeBe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater!
items.body: High quality fabric. I got the beige and it is just the right medium weight, not see-through at all. It is warm but breathable, kept the cold air off me but didn't make me sweat. The fit is excellent, very fitted and properly tailored. The ribbing turns into a more narrow gauge around the cuffs and hips, which gives a more sophisticated look. Another subtle detail is that the raised parts of the ribs in the fabric are ever so slightly shiny, but the sunken parts are matte, if that makes any sense. A luxe garment for a reasonable price. I measure 39-32-40 and wanted a snug fit but not tight. The Medium was perfect. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality. Well worth the price. Fits as expected
items.body: I bought this sweater for a holiday trip to NYC. I get cold easily as I was born,raised and live in Florida. This sweater is heavier in weight. I was surprised when I took it out of the package at the weight of it. Very fitted but has good stretch to it. I have a tummy and while it is fitted it didn't show my "rolls". In addition, because it is fitted the sleeves do not ride up so it was easy to layer without the sweater bunching up. It kept me very warn. This is not a cheaply made sweater. It is a better quality sweater than the one I bought at Nordstroms. This sweater looks like it could have come from Nordstrom or a higher end store. I weight 187 and I'm 5'4 and purchased an XL. Highly recommend this sweater. You will not be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Jordyn Hebert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality
items.body: Very nice thickness for the cold nights in New England! Excellent quality. Read more
items.author: Cynthia Edwards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good fit and the color is right as navy blue which is what I wanted!
items.body: It's perfect. I love it. After numerous try to purchase a navy blue sweater, I finally got it with this one. FYI, you described it on line as blue. You should change description to navy blue!!! Read more
items.author: Andree M.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: I like this sweater, it was the perfect color and fit, but it is really, really heavy, I could not wear it long in the house, it is really a heavyweight material. I had it on under my outside jacket and it was around 40 degrees out and long after being out the jacket had to come off. Read more
items.author: Dawn Faircloth

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Purple Gradient, Brown, Blue, Grey Stripes, Apricot, Black, Orange Stripes, Pink&blue, White&black, Wine Red, Pink, Rubber Red, Ivory, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
